query: WITH entities AS (SELECT collateralization_ratio, id FROM credit_facilities WHERE ((collateralization_ratio IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $3) AND COALESCE(id > $2, true) OR COALESCE(collateralization_ratio > $3, collateralization_ratio IS NOT NULL)) ORDER BY collateralization_ratio ASC NULLS FIRST, id ASC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: CreditFacilityId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.collateralization_ratio asc nulls first, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
